Classes.​Queue

A first-in-first-out data structure.

Functions
util.​Queue
function util.Queue()

Creates a new queue object.

Returns
Queue

The new queue object.

Members
First

Type: number

The index into Items that contains the item at the front of the queue.

Last

Type: number

The index into Items that contains the item at the back of the queue.

Items

Type: table

The table that contains all of the items stored in the queue.

Methods
Push
function CLASS:Push(
item
)

Pushes an item onto the back of the queue.

Parameters
any item

The item to push onto the queue.

Pop
function CLASS:Pop()

Removes the first item in line from the queue and returns it.

Returns
any

The first item in line or nil if the queue is empty.

Count
function CLASS:Count()

Returns the number of items currently in the queue.

Returns
number

The amount of items currently in the queue.

Empty
function CLASS:Empty()

Removes all items from the queue, effectively resetting it.
